      • getAllRows

        public <T extends Model> List<T> getAllRows(String table,
                                   String where,
                                   String orderby)
        Gets the rows of specified table that matches "where" condition. The rows are ordered as says the "orderby" parameter
        Parameters:
        table - Table containing the rows
        where - Where condition of SQL sentence
        orderby - Orderby part of SQL sentence
        Returns:
        A list of Model's subclass objects

      • insertPracticeSession

        public boolean insertPracticeSession(long courseCode,
                            long groupCode,
                            String startDate,
                            String endDate,
                            String site,
                            String description)
        Inserts a practice session in database
        Parameters:
        courseCode - Course code to be referenced
        groupCode - Group code to be referenced
        startDate - Start date-time of session
        endDate - End date-time of session
        site - Site where session takes place
        description - Optional description of practice session
        Returns:
        True if practice session does not exist in database and is inserted. False otherwise.
